website_summaries.verdict: For those Star Wars fans who seek a more authentic Lightsaber experience. Each set contains multiple blades and hilts from across the entire Star Wars movie spectrum.
pros: Offers a wide variety of blade, hilt and accessory choices
Some blades retract, adding to realism
cons: Blades break easily with aggressive play
Expensive for the quality of materials

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE packaging
customer_reviews.text: Beware: this item arrives looking nothing like the photo. It arrives in a standard brown box with the pieces thrown inside. This wouldn’t be a big deal if I were handing it to my own kid. However, when giving it as a gift to a 5 year old boy who has no idea what’s in it, it’s highly annoying. I had to print out a picture of what it is SUPPOSED to look like so that he knew what it was. Not acceptable. The box says to see the insteuctions, but those aren’t included either.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A Stars Wars fan must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to purchase a Lightsaber, but never got around to it. After reading the article about the Stat Wars Land and how much they charge for a Lightsaber, I decided to go with the least expensive option for the same product I would get at the park. This is Awesome! A Master Saber with 3 in 1. You can configure them in many different ways. Great construction. They all need batteries that are not included. A joy for every fan!!
customer_reviews.author: H. D.

customer_reviews.title: Brown boxed
customer_reviews.text: This was a very interesting style saber set, thought to be awesome for grandson. Though the packaging was not a labeled box showing the product and enhancements. For a gift it should have Eye appeal . This only gives me the option to rate low.
customer_reviews.author: Grams Park (mid Ohio)

customer_reviews.title: Toy does not arrive as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The toy itself is fine, the piece appear to be all there however this item does not arrive as pictured which is really disappointing. This toy was purchased as a birthday gift and it arrived in a brown box with the pieces loose in the box. Very disappointing. I’ll be returning to buy another similar item but one that comes in a retail box since it’s a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty McCue

customer_reviews.title: Fun Star Wars toys
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for the star wars enthusiast kid, you can make several different light sabers. However, remember to buy batteries there is only a couple in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift (for kids of all ages)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson for his 10th birthday. He wanted one to change and interchange parts to make various weapons. He was totally thrilled with it and all it’s functions, (the lights and sounds).
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 years old son's birthday; he loved it! At first I was a little skeptical about buying, but I decided to get it any ways; Great decision! It came packaged in orginal blade builders box. Would recommend this if your child/grandchild is into starwars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy is very strong and can handle some abuse. ALL lightsabers in this product light up, but the green ones don't make sound. The manufacturers should also include instructions on how to set the lightsaber to off, demo, and on mode using the black switch on the back of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ellis

customer_reviews.title: The disappointment is strong in this one
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest...not every kid is cut out to be a Jedi. The disappointment is strong in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Pie Princess

customer_reviews.title: Star wars fan must have
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son the star wars fan absolutely loves this! Everything lights up!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The force is strong in my young Padawan
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old son lost his mind when he opened this bladebuilders set for Christmas. Everything else fell to the wayside as he spent hours leaping from room to room throughout the house showing off his new lightsaber combinations (with dramatic fighting stances ofcourse). Worth every penny just to see his imagination run wild.
customer_reviews.author: Clint lasher

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Our son’s favorite toy for the last couple months and it’s really durable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice idea. It is a well crafted toy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice idea. It is a well crafted toy. I got this for my niece and the only issue she had was locking each blade into place. She still loves it though
customer_reviews.author: wackums

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This does work with other Bladebuilders sets. My 7 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids have loved playing with this and exploring all the different combinations for customizing it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sons love bladebuilders
customer_reviews.text: My boys love all the bladebuilder swords. All sturdy, and interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Marie Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Great sets to build and play.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these sets. Spend hours building sabers and dueling.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: a good toy
customer_reviews.text: made well, easy to assemble and dissemble, many different ways to create your own light-saber, big hit in our house
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old grandson loved tis he loves putting it together in so many different ways
customer_reviews.author: angela clark

customer_reviews.title: 6YO Approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my friend’s 6YO’s birthday. HE LOVED IT! Huge success
customer_reviews.author: KRob

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: My son really really loved he said that he usually doesn't like the electrical lightsabers but that this one was absolutely awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Felt like good quality material but broke the day I gave it to my son for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: E. Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Nephews loved these. Everything arrived as promised and they were a big hit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great for Star Wars fans. My 11 year old loves it. He likes all the different combos you can do.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: These broke after a month (just long enough to not return them) of play. My boys were very disappointed since the description said “durable.”
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Recupito

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gift for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for my 7 year old. So many versital ways to create a light saber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your kid likes Star Wars just get this. ...
customer_reviews.text: If your kid likes Star Wars just get this. My son spends a ton of time reconfiguring his light saber and playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Davo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: 12 year old nephew loved the gift. It lights up and makes noises. It is also modular so my nephew was able to combine with other pieces he had. This is a fairly large toy which made it more impressive as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: My son has spent numerous hours playing with this light saber and all the configurations.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good assortment of light saber options. My son loves this set.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN A. DESROCHERS

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: Exploded batteries were inside!! Needless to say I’m not happy. I hope they do the right thing and send me a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Dance

customer_reviews.title: Sound was bad on the light saber and was delivered loose out ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound was bad on the light saber and was delivered loose out of its original packaging and re-boxed in another huge box! Very messy and disappointing to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Bobanna

customer_reviews.title: my Kids Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play with... We had a very good time every afternoon! This product is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Happy, happy little boy!!
customer_reviews.text: Present for my 5 year old grandson, his mouth fell open and he stared at it for a minute then jumped on me, thank you, thank you, thank you! He was elated! A Win-Win for grandmother!!

customer_reviews.title: Its a great toy.
customer_reviews.text: This brought a lot of pleasure. Its a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: JC502

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: Came in a brown box, all the pieces just thrown in there. nothing like the photo. I have to print out a picture of what it’s supposed to be so on Christmas when my nephew opens it he knows what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I am eleven and I love it. It’s pretty durable and I can make a few different combinations from the set. But there are not many options without the other blade builder sets and it’s not the brightest you can find but it still survives all the hard crashes of duelling the house!
customer_reviews.author: sun180

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is enjoying his light saber. Thank you for timely shipping.
customer_reviews.author: edgar r lamar

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Hold up well to abuse
customer_reviews.text: Easy to change out parts even for my 5 year old twins. They hold up well to abuse and not super loud.
customer_reviews.author: nina castellon

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I had been wanting for a while and I was not disappointed. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Zwolf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and won't put them down. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this, or my son does, so I do. Santa brought this for him and he wanted to buy the red version with his Christmas money. He makes some bada** light sabers with all the pieces. Love that it works with all the Bladebuilders products which I wasn't expecting. Picture has both sets, not just this one, so don't get mad if you order and don't get the red pieces!! Endless products.
customer_reviews.author: tas

customer_reviews.title: My nephews still love these light sabers and use them a year after ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephews still love these light sabers and use them a year after I gave them as gifts. Best version of this kind of toy I've encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Adelman

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in a plain cardboard box instead so won’t look as nice as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and the packaging is not as described. It arrived in a plain cardboard box instead so won’t look as nice as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Melk

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, light sabers can be glitchy
customer_reviews.text: The concept is amazing and the number of ways our son can design jedi swords is amazing. He loved it and we enjoy seeing his creations. However, the one we received had a blade that would not light up and another that would not turn off. This was a Santa gift so getting a new one is difficult. Plus I paid more than I would have in the store because I couldn't find one. I would have given 5 stars had this brand new toy worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My seven-year-old nephew absolutely love that! It was the best Star Wars related gift ever.
customer_reviews.author: JBA

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. "It makes lots of combinations! "
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Smart and fun
customer_reviews.text: This has been played with by my 8-year-old (the actual recipient of the gift) as well as every other member of my family. My oldest son spends time making weapons that will or won't cut off his own limbs and then makes his younger brothers guess which limb. Lots of laughing at this game when he enacts the motion and dramatically falls down without a leg. I've played with it - but I'm a bonafide Star Wars geek, so that doesn't carry much weight. It's cool because you don't have to love Star Wars to create elaborate combinations.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: This is the set that you want
customer_reviews.text: This is the set that you want. My daughter and I went light saber crazy after watching "The Last Jedi". The sound effects are really cool. It's part of the bladebuilder system so you can interchange with other sets. Unlike some of the other sets, the light daggers in this set light up.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ames

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this thing. He loves to change the configuration and play pretend fighting. I gave it a 4 star because it is definitely cheaply made. One of the smaller swords would not turn on and It took a couple of whacks in my palm to get it to work (don’t judge). The buttons for those smaller swords are incredibly flimsy and cheap feeling, like a dollar store find. I wouldn’t buy this again and I won’t buy any add ons for it but my son does love it and is entertained for a long time with it.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect for my Yoda Cake design I created & made ...
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for my Yoda Cake design I created & made for my grandson ... Grandson loved it. Photo of Yoda Cake holding one of the three light sabers set.
customer_reviews.author: malteseFalcon

customer_reviews.title: 8 Year Old Nephew Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew for Christmas and he LOVES this Lightsaber! Very cool all of the different combinations of light sabers that can be made and there is a pamphlet that shows the different kinds. The back of the box also shows the different combos larger than the pamphlet, and we cut it out so that my nephew could see them better. Only downfall is that it does take a lot of batteries (but what doesn't now a days!). Overall, great product and my nephew was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this with his Jedi Costume for the Boy Scout ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this with his Jedi Costume for the Boy Scout float. We used it just as a prop for the costume but any child or adult would live the multi function of this light saber. The sounds and lights are really good compared to others we looked at. My son had the most fun configuring all the different positions of the toy. If your child is into Star Wars it’s a great addition to their collection.
customer_reviews.author: LEF

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price and
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son after he saw the build-your-own lightsaber product at Disney World, which I did not buy him because I thought it was over-priced. This is a great price and, in my opinion, a better product. We couldn't get the one at Disney World to stay together very well (they have samples for you to play with). This one stays together great. I am thinking of getting another one so my son can play with his friends or siblings.
customer_reviews.author: Domesticated

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented! Not what pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This did not come as advertised. What came was a plain box with the parts thrown in! It doesn't look like this at all! Obviously cheated but don't know what to do with Christmas upon us! It's what my grandson wants. I've now received two of these that were not what was advertised through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Anne C Feighner

customer_reviews.title: A must for Star Wars fans of all ages
customer_reviews.text: My eight-year-old son has enjoyed all sorts of lightsabers with this set! He even takes other lightsabers he has and is able to use them with this as well. Promotes creativity and hours of fun. High-quality. Durable. Withstands all of the changes and play from my rough and tumble little guy! I can see adult Star Wars fans loving this just as much as kids.
customer_reviews.author: KLO29

customer_reviews.title: Good for your child who loves Star Wars
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old son loves it. He enjoys building different swords. We don't have any other sets but this one and it allows enough different combinations to keep him happy. They bright lit up and turn on/off easy. Amazon had the best price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE this thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson. I had no idea the box was so big, but he LOVED it. I was pretty amazed at how cool this was and I'm not even a Star Wars fan. All of his friends are competing for who gets to play with it next. Definitely recommended as a great gift for kids.
customer_reviews.author: AnkleBuster

customer_reviews.title: Sorely disappointed. I should have paid a lot less to ...
customer_reviews.text: What I ordered vs what came is very different in its presentation. My kid’s reaction on Christmas when they open this will not be what I expected, as they have to dump out the pieces and figure out exactly what it is. I’m not sure about the functionality yet but I have my doubts. I wonder if this is a rip-off product and that’s why it isn’t in the packing shown? Sorely disappointed. I should have paid a lot less to dump out a bunch of plastic pieces from a box. We warned - you may not get what you pay for on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Canada

customer_reviews.title: Really a fun toy for your Star Wars loving kids
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo got this for his birthday yesterday. He (and his 6yo brother) have not stopped playing with them yet. So many combinations. Really a fun toy for your Star Wars loving kids! Make sure you have 6 AAA batteries on hand when you open this for the 2 small green lightsabers!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift especially considering the timing of the new movie ...
customer_reviews.text: My ten year-old son flipped out opening this present on Christmas and has played with it several times since. Perfect gift especially considering the timing of the new movie release. Toy is of good quality- highly recommended to anyone with a little Star Wars fan in the house :)
customer_reviews.author: suasorias

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Price!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wanting these and I could not justify spending $50 bucks on them. When I seen it for $24.99 I brought them quick! He is going to be thrilled! Now I can spend a little more on other things for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nancarrow

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun for our younger cousin (and frankly, the whole family) at Christmas. It's a great toy...just make sure to have extra batteries around! We planned ahead and were glad we did. It comes with a couple but not enough for the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy but not so great lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love Star Wars and our son is now a fan as well. We gave him this for Christmas and he loves it. However, the blue light saber light stopped working about three weeks later. A little disappointed, but he still plays with the green ones.
customer_reviews.author: Just my experience

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my 5 year old brother. He was ecstatic and could assemble it all by himself with ease. A great gift for any Star Wars fans. Sound effects are realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Brock & Jess

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. my 6 year old has been playing with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect . my 6 year old has been playing with it non stop. With all the different combinations you can do , it gives a lot of entertainment for him. And the pieces are not hard to switch out. He's been able to do it with no help from us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A HOME RUN BIRTHDAY PRESENT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson's 9th birthday, and he LOVES it. He informed me that it was the best birthday present he had ever gotten. Even more surprising is the fact that he is still crazy about it weeks later. Recommended for all young Jedi Masters.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coolest toy ever
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly the coolest toy ever. My son (7) likes Star Wars, and he and I now go around the house fighting with these lightsabers. He likes to configure them in different ways, and the sound effects are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marx

customer_reviews.title: Umm...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what's up with the product I received but the box is torn and the toy is all dusty like it's been in a warehouse on a shelf for years... I need it for Christmas so I can't return it but I am attaching pics .. it's gross.
customer_reviews.author: H. Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This bladebuilders set is well worth the price. My Grandson loves it and has played with it for hours. It allows him to be creative and make many different light saber configurations. Great product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: But bought it for my 9yr old son and it is his favorite. He loves that all three light up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not to sure about this. But bought it for my 9yr old son and it is his favorite. He loves that all three light up and he can rearrange them. Also that he can use each part seperate too. He is looking forward to getting other blade builders to connect to. Takes many batteries and that makes it heavier but still a neat toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My son literally spent Christmas day playing with this until ...
customer_reviews.text: My son literally spent Christmas day playing with this until he passed out from exhaustion. Durable, yet lightweight. No problems thus far. . .except for the price, but hey, supply and demand.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: My grandson who is 7 loved it. Also the other kids at the party ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson who is 7 loved it. Also the other kids at the party wanted it also. They were able to play with the detachable blades.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived perfectly and my child will love it thank you
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a fun toy but the switch to make it light up ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a fun toy but the switch to make it light up is bad. It seems to move inside so when your hold down the button to light it up it sometimes light and sometimes doesn't. The point is for it to light up.
customer_reviews.author: Yarayma

customer_reviews.title: Looks and sounds awesome! My grandson is going to love this
customer_reviews.text: Looks and sounds awesome! My grandson is going to love this! He's a big Star Wars fan. I like that you can add to this to make it more awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Old man

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's 7th birthday and he loves it! Very neat, the blue and red light sabers light up and the blue one makes lighsaber noises when you move it around. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: My 7yo nephew loved this product
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo nephew loved this product. Most importantly, it was durable as he tried to bang it on every possible surface. :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Coin

customer_reviews.title: Really Neat Light Sabers
customer_reviews.text: My son, 9, loved this! He got a couple sets and plays with them all the time. He has even taken it outside in the dark to take out the trash and get the mail - multi-purpose. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Anna D

customer_reviews.title: he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his 7th birthday and he loves it. It is now 3 months later, he still plays with it and it isn't broken. With 3 little boys in the house that's saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the young Jedi in your life
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the young Jedi in your life! My daughter is 5, and can easily manipulate the pieces to build and take apart the components of the light sabers.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: This is so epic! But there are other attachments ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so epic! But there are other attachments you need to buy, it looked very complete, but its not.
customer_reviews.author: Caren Miller

customer_reviews.title: This was the hit at Hannuka for my grandson. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the hit at Hannuka for my grandson. Can't wait till his Birthday. Dec 18 Star Wars opens.
customer_reviews.author: grammy1

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy for him to assemble and disassemble
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son loves this. It is very easy for him to assemble and disassemble. Needs quite a few batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Koenig

customer_reviews.title: ✅
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my seven-year-old grandson wanted for his birthday. It was a very good price versus what I found locally. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My sons love this toy along with a few other blade builders they got for Christmas. My kids are crazy for Star Wars and love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Horton

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my son's collection. If you have any of these sets already these easilyvadd on and enhance your child's current creation!
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday present and he loved it! Great gift for a Star Wars loving kid :-)
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: I love it because my nephew said it was his favorite ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it because my nephew said it was his favorite this Christmas :) It all went together very easily and lit up as it should
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Light Saber
customer_reviews.text: This was my 8 yr old grandson's favorite gift this Christmas. It is awesome!!! He had no problems connecting any of the pieces to make whatever kind of light saber he imagined. I am so glad I purchased this product and highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: jinness

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 as gift for my grandsons - they absolutely love it. Only issues is that it requires 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 as gift for my grandsons - they absolutely love it. Only issues is that it requires 9 batteries, but this is stated on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Fullerin

customer_reviews.title: 6 yr old Star Wars fan is happy
customer_reviews.text: Not as well made as I was hoping for the price but the birthday boy is over the moon.
customer_reviews.author: John J Chasney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very durable. My kids love it! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B

customer_reviews.title: My grandson has enjoyed playing with this toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has enjoyed playing with this toy. He likes the fact that our can change the positions. Only complaint is that it takes a lot of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Best gift from Granny
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson for Christmas. Best gift from Granny! Recommend for all Star Wars heroes!
customer_reviews.author: Genelle McDonald-Brown

customer_reviews.title: May the force be with you as your kids battle with these cool noise makers! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool high quality. You need to buy the Kylo Ren and Luke Skywalker ones to complete this though.
customer_reviews.author: LEIGH ATWELL

customer_reviews.title: Light saber insanity!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this toy and he builds some wacky and awesome (though impractical) light sabers. His mom and dad says he takes it apart and builds it all over again every morning
customer_reviews.author: Dave Brown

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wanted this for Christmas, he was so happy the sword is really cool and he loves it. Good material and good sounds
customer_reviews.author: Eu Za

customer_reviews.title: Star wars
customer_reviews.text: My sons ordered these. They are 8 & 11. They loved them!! They really are pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Deana D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son loves this toy and he has pretty much grown out of toys. He won't put it down.
customer_reviews.author: SKV

product_meta.title: Star Wars Bladebuilders Jedi Master Lightsaber
product_meta.description: Every Star Wars fan needs a lightsaber or two! This electronic, Jedi Master Lightsaber lights up and makes sounds just like in the movies. Although fun on its own, this lightsaber really shines when the lights go out.
feature_bullets: Create adventures and scenes from the Star Wars Universe
Includes Lightsaber, 2 Lightdaggers, 2 elbow connectors, cross connector, dual connector, expansion hilt and instructions.
